Articles.Content:
Sorry if this is not the right area.

I just want to see if I'm doing something wrong?

I had done about 5 mun landing/science/flag missions, and then I got a Duna mission. I am flying there but while I travel I am doing more contracts. Still more mun landings. No Minmus or any others.

Anyone else having this issue? Think it'll change after Duna?
It depends on how you progress. If you fly to Duna the game will think you're ready for more difficult contracts like visiting Jool. It will then give less contracts concerning Mun and Minmus.

heh I think out has to do with what contacts you've done and your total rep level.

If I may, I would like to offer a suggestion. After you get all the science, you can just get a different admin building strategy that turns science into income. Build a station in orbit around Kerbin and accept tge missions about transmitting data from orbit for some mulah.

(I like to switch crews afterwards to kimda limit myself a bit )

I.E. turn those bad contracts into a source of fun and profit.

heh I think out has to do with what contacts you've done and your total rep level.

If I may, I would like to offer a suggestion. After you get all the science, you can just get a different admin building strategy that turns science into income. Build a station in orbit around Kerbin and accept tge missions about transmitting data from orbit for some mulah.

(I like to switch crews afterwards to kimda limit myself a bit )

I.E. turn those bad contracts into a source of fun and profit.

You read my mind. Exactly what i did.

Totally milked it so I could get those celestial satellites out there...but it was less fun than multiple planet contracts. That was my only concern.
